Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00031 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00022
Titel CDA-CH Nationalität
Titre CDA-CH Nationalité
Title tbd it CDA-CH Nazionalità
Title CDA-CH citizenship
Beschreibung Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu CDA-CH Nationalität
Description Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur la nationalité
descritpiton tbd it Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per il CDA-CH nazionalità
Description The following rules describe the tests for the CDA-CH citizenship
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1501_as00180 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:observation
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Nationalität' muss als 'observation' im CDA Body deklariert werden
Description Les 'Nationalité' CDA-CH doit être déclarée comme 'observation' dans le CDA Body
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Nazionalità' devono essere dichiarate come 'observation' nel CDA Body
Description CDA-CH 'citizenship' must be declared as 'observation' in the CDA Body
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1502_as00181 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" and @code="66476-3"] or cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.756.5.30.1.106.1.10.10" and @code="103.101.10"]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Nationalität' muss mit dem LOINC Code 66476-3 (Country of citizenship) codiert werden
Description La 'Nationalité' CDA-CH doit être codée avec le code LOINC 66476-3 (Country of citizenship)
descritpiton tbd it La CDA-CH 'Nazionalità' deve essere codificato con il codice LOINC 66476-3 (Country of citizenship)
Description CDA-CH 'citizenship' must be coded with the LOINC Code 66476-3 (Country of citizenship)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1503_as00182 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type="II" and @root="1.0.3166" and @extension=$ISO_3166-1_Entry/ISO_3166-1_Alpha-2_Code_element]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Nationalität' muss einen gültigen alpha-2 code der ISO 3166 Tabelle enthalten (OID: 1.0.3166; iso_3166-1_list_en.xml)
Description La 'Nationalité' CDA-CH doit contenir un code alpha-2 de ISO 3166 (OID: 1.0.3166; iso_3166-1_list_en.xml)
descritpiton tbd it La CDA-CH 'Nazionalità' deve contenere un codice alpha-2 secondo ISO 3166 (OID: 1.0.3166; iso_3166-1_list_en.xml)
Description CDA-CH 'citizenship' must contain an alpha-2 code from ISO 3166 (OID: 1.0.3166; iso_3166-1_list_en.xml)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1504_as00183 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.756.5.30.1.106.1.10.10" and @code="103.101.10"])
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Nationalität' enthält einen veralten Code (2.16.756.5.30.1.106.1.10.10). Der LOINC Code 66476-3 wird bevorzugt.
Description CDA-CH 'citizenship' contains a deprecated OID (2.16.756.5.30.1.106.1.10.10). The LOINC code 66476-3 is preferred.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00023 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: cda-ch.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:09.134+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00032 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00023
Titel CDA-CH Behandlungsliste
Titre CDA-CH liste de treatments
Title tbd it CDA-CH Lista trattamenti
Title CDA-CH list of treatments
Beschreibung Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu den CDA-CH Behandlungsliste
Description Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur la 'liste de treatments'
descritpiton tbd it Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per la CDA-CH Lista trattamenti
Description The following rules describe the tests on the CDA-CH list of treatments
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1601_as00184 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:section
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' muss als 'section' im CDA Body deklariert werden
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH doit être déclarée comme 'section' dans le CDA Body
descritpiton tbd it La CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' deve essere dichiarata come 'section' nel CDA Body
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' must be declared as a 'Section' in the CDA Body
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1602_as00185 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' muss einen narrativen Text enthalten
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH doit contenir un texte narratif
descritpiton tbd it La CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' deve contenere un testo narrativo
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' must contain a narrative text
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1603_as00186 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:title="Behandlungen" and //cda:languageCode/@code="de-CH") or //cda:languageCode/@code!="de-CH"
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' in Deutsch muss einen section title 'Behandlungen' enthalten
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH en allemand doit contenir un section title 'Behandlungen'
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' in tedesco devono contenere un section title 'Behandlungen'
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' in German must contain a 'Behandlungen' section title
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1604_as00187 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:title="Treatments" and //cda:languageCode/@code="fr-CH") or //cda:languageCode/@code!="fr-CH"
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' in Französisch muss einen section title 'Treatments' enthalten
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH en français doit contenir un section title 'Treatments'
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' in francese devono contenere un section title 'Treatments'
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' in French must contain a 'Treatments' section title
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1605_as00188 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:title="Trattamenti" and //cda:languageCode/@code="it-CH") or //cda:languageCode/@code!="it-CH"
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' in Italienisch muss einen section title 'Trattamenti' enthalten
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH en italien doit contenir un section title 'Trattamenti'
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' in italiano devono contenere un section title 'Trattamenti'
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' in Italian must contain a 'Trattamenti' section title
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1606_as00189 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:title="Treatments" and //cda:languageCode/@code="en") or //cda:languageCode/@code!="en"
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' in Englisch muss einen section title 'Treatments' enthalten
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH en anglais doit contenir un section title 'Treatments'
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' in inglese devono contenere un section title 'Treatments'
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' in English must contain a 'Treatments' section title
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1607_as00190 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" and @code=$cda-ch-codeSystem[@codeSystemName="TreatmentSectionCode"]/code/@value]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' muss eine Codierung der Bedeutung der Section enthalten (gültiger Wert aus der Wertetabelle '2.16.840.1.113883.6.1')
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH doit contenir un codage de la signification de la section (valeur valable du tableau de valeurs '2.16.840.1.113883.6.1')
descritpiton tbd it La CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' deve contenere un codice del significato della section (valore valido della tabella di valori '2.16.840.1.113883.6.1')
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' must contain a coding of the significance of the section (valid value from the table of values '2.16.840.1.113883.6.1')
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1608_as00191 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: descendant::*[cda:templateId/@root="2.16.756.5.30.1.1.1.1.1" and (cda:templateId/@extension="CDA-CH.Body.ProcL1" or cda:templateId/@extension="CDA-CH.Body.ProcL3")]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungsliste' muss mindestens eine procedure 'Behandlung' enthalten
Description La 'liste de treatments' CDA-CH doit contenir au moins une procedure 'Treatment'
descritpiton tbd it La CDA-CH 'Lista trattamenti' deve contenere almeno una procedure 'Trattamento'
Description CDA-CH 'List of treatments' must contain at least a 'Treatment' procedure
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00024 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00033 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00024
Titel CDA-CH Behandlungsliste L1
Titre CDA-CH liste de treatments L1
Title tbd it CDA-CH Lista trattamenti L1
Title CDA-CH L1 list of treatments
Beschreibung Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu den CDA-CH Behandlungsliste
Description Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur la 'liste de treatments'
descritpiton tbd it Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per la CDA-CH Lista trattamenti
Description The following rules describe the tests on CDA-CH list of treatments
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1701_as00192 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:procedure
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen als 'procedure' im CDA Body deklariert werden (section 'Behandlungen')
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent être déclarés comme 'procedure' dans le CDA Body (section 'Treatments')
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono essere dichiarate come 'observation' nel CDA Body (section 'Trattamenti')
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must be declared as an 'Observation' in the CDA Body ('Treatments' section)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1702_as00193 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen ein den Durchführungszeitpunkt resp. -zeitraum enthalten
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir le point de temps ou la période d'exécution
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un punto del tempo o il periodo di attuazione
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a point of time or the period of the execution
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1703_as00194 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen einen narrativen Text enthalten
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir un texte narratif
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un testo narrativo
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a narrative text
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00025 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00034 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00025
Titel CDA-CH Einzelne Behandlung L3
Titre CDA-CH treatment individuel L3
Title tbd it CDA-CH Trattamenti individuale L3
Title CDA-CH L3 single Treatment
Beschreibung Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu einer Behandlung im Level 3
Description Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur une treatment individuel
descritpiton tbd it Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per una Trattamento Level 3
Description The following rules describe the tests on a treatment in level 3
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1801_as00195 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:procedure
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen als 'procedure' im CDA Body deklariert werden (section 'Behandlungen')
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent être déclarés comme 'procedure' dans le CDA Body (section 'Treatments')
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono essere dichiarate come 'observation' nel CDA Body (section 'Trattamenti')
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must be declared as an 'Observation' in the CDA Body ('Treatments' section)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1802_as00196 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen ein den Durchführungszeitpunkt resp. -zeitraum enthalten
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir le point de temps ou la période d'exécution
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un punto del tempo o il periodo di attuazione
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a point of time or the period of the execution
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1803_as00197 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen einen narrativen Text enthalten
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir un texte narratif
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un testo narrativo
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a narrative text
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1804_as00198 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem and @code]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen einen Code enthalten und das Code System angeben (CDA Body Level 3)
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir un code et mentionner le Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un codice e indicare il Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a code and state the coding system (CDA Body Level 3)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1805_as00199 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:performer/cda:assignedEntity/cda:assignedPerson/cda:name
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen mindestens den Namen des verantwortlichen Arztes angeben ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Description Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent indiquer au moins le nom du médecin qui est responsable pur le treatment ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono indicare almeno il nome del medico che ha formulato la Trattamenti ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Description CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain at least the assessing doctor’s name ('performer/assignsedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00035 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00026
Titel CDA-CH Einzelne Bemerkung L3
Titre CDA-CH remarque individuel L3
Title tbd it CDA-CH Osservazione individuale L3
Title CDA-CH L3 single remark
Beschreibung Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu einer Bemerkung im Level 3
Description Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur une remarque individuel
descritpiton tbd it Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per una Osservazioni Level 3
Description The following rules describe the tests on a remark in level 3
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1901_as00200 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:observation
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen als 'observation' im CDA Body deklariert werden (section 'Bemerkungen')
Description Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent être déclarés comme 'observation' dans le CDA Body (section 'Remarques')
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono essere dichiarate come 'observation' nel CDA Body (section 'Osservazioni')
Description CDA-CH 'Remarks' must be declared as an 'Observation' in the CDA Body ('Remarks' section)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1902_as00201 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen ein Datum der Feststellung enthalten
Description Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir une date de constatation
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono contenere una data di constatazione
Description CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a date of detection
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1903_as00202 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen einen narrativen Text enthalten
Description Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir un texte narratif
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono contenere un testo narrativo
Description CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a narrative text
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1904_as00203 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem and @code]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen einen Code enthalten und das Code System angeben (CDA Body Level 3)
Description Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir un code et mentionner le Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono contenere un codice e indicare il Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
Description CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a code and state the coding system (CDA Body Level 3)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1905_as00204 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:performer/cda:assignedEntity/cda:assignedPerson/cda:name
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen mindestens den Namen des beurteilenden Arztes angeben ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Description Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent indiquer au moins le nom du médecin qui a posé le Remarque ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono indicare almeno il nome del medico che ha formulato la Osservazioni ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Description CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain at least the assessing doctor’s name ('performer/assignsedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1906_as00205 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type="CE"]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen einen codierten Wert enthalten (mögliche Werteliste: 2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1)
Description Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir un valeur codée (valeurs possible: '2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1')
descritpiton tbd it Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono deve contenere un valore codificato (lista dei valori possibile: 2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1)
Description CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a coded value (possible list of values: 2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1)

Titel CDA-CH Einzelne CDA Body Section
Titre CDA-CH Body Section individuel
Title tbd it CDA-CH Body Section individuale
Title CDA-CH individual Body Section
Beschreibung Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu einer einzelnen CDA Body Section
Description Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur une section CDA Body individuel
descritpiton tbd it Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per un Body Section individuale
Description The following rules describe the tests on individual Body Section

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00037 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00028
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00207 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@value) or @nullFlavor or matches(@value,'^\d{0,8}$') or matches(@value,'^\d{12,14}[+-]\d{4}$')
Beschreibung Das Datum muss dem folgenden Muster entsprechen: YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS]+HHMM
Description La date doit correspondre au schéma suivant: YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS]+HHMM
Description The date must match the following pattern: YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS]+HHMM
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00208 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@value) or @nullFlavor or matches(@value,'^\d{4}\d+') or matches(@value,'^\d{4}$')
Beschreibung Das Datum muss dem folgenden Muster entsprechen: YYYY[MM[DD]]
Description La date doit correspondre au schéma suivant: YYYY[MM[DD]]
Description The date must match the following pattern: YYYY[MM[DD]]
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00038 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00028

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@value) or @nullFlavor or matches(@value,'^\d{0,8}$') or matches(@value,'^\d{12,14}[+-]\d{4}$')

Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00029 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:09.134+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00040 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00029
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00213 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: @classCode='OBS' and @moodCode='EVN'
Description Dose numbers must be declared by an observation containing classCode='OBS' and moodCode='EVN'
Beschreibung Lot-Nummern müssen mit einer observation und folgenden Attributen deklariert werden: classCode='OBS' und moodCode='EVN'
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00214 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' and @code='30973-2']
Description Dose numbers must be declared using the LOINC code 30973-2
Beschreibung Lot-Nummern müssen mit dem LOINC Code 30973-2 deklariert werden
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00215 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code='completed']
Description Dose numbers must be declared using a completed statusCode
Beschreibung Lot-Nummern müssen mit statusCode completed angegeben werden
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00216 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type='ST' and text()]
Description Dose numbers must be declared as text in the value element using xsi:type='ST'
Beschreibung Lot-Nummern müssen als Text im 'value' Element mit xsi:type='ST' angegeben werden
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00030 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: cda-ch.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:09.134+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00041 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00030
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00217 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:externalDocument[@classCode='DOC' and @moodCode='EVN']
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Externe Referenz' muss mit einer externalReference und folgenden Attributen deklariert werden: classCode='DOC' und moodCode='EVN'
Description CDA-CH 'External Reference' must be declared by an externalReference containing classCode='DOC' and moodCode='EVN'
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00218 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:externalDocument/cda:id
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Externe Referenz' muss mit einer id identifiziert werden
Description CDA-CH 'External Reference' must be identified using an id
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00219 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:externalDocument/cda:text[not(@mediaType) or (@mediaType and @representation='B64')]/cda:reference[@value]
Beschreibung CDA-CH 'Externe Referenz' muss mit einem <text> Element deklariert werden, welches das Document Base64 codiert einbettet und mit einem <reference> Element auf den Bereich im menschlich lesbaren Text verweist, wo die Referenz genannt ist. Alternativ kann das externe Dokument als Link deklariert werden. In diesem Fall MUSS der Link als URL angegeben werden, welcher auf das referenzierte Dokument verweist. Der gleiche Link MUSS im menschlich lesbaren Text mit dem <linkHTML> Element angegeben werden.
Description CDA-CH 'External Reference' must contain a <text> element that contains the Base64 encoded document and a <reference> element pointing to the narrative text where the reference is recorded. Alternatively the external document may be referenced by URL. In this case the same URL MUST be declared using the <linkHTML> element in the narrative text.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_cda-ch_pa00031 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: cda-ch.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:09.134+01:00

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: string-length(@code) = 2 or substring(@code,4,2) = $vhitg-codeSystem[@codeSystemName='ISO3166-1']/code/@value

Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1-errors_pa00067 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00079 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1-errors_pa00067
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00266 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ../cda:languageCommunication
Description In IHE PCC Language Communication (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1), the IHE PCC LanguageCommunication shall describe this information using the languageCommunication element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00267 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:languageCode
Description In IHE PCC Language Communication (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1), the languageCode element describes the language code. It uses the same vocabulary described for the ClinicalDocument/languageCode element described in more detail in HL7 CRS: 2.1.1. This element is required.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00268 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:modeCode) or cda:modeCode[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.60"]
Description In IHE PCC Language Communication (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1), the modeCode element describes the mode of use, and is only necessary when there are differences between expressive and receptive abilities. This element is optional. When not present, the assumption is that any further detail provided within the languageCommunication element refers to all common modes of communication. The coding system used shall be the HL7 LanguageAbilityMode vocabulary when this element is communicated.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00269 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:proficiencyLevelCode) or cda:proficiencyLevelCode[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.61"]
Description In IHE PCC Language Communication (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1), the proficiencyLevelCode element describes the proficiency of the patient (with respect to the mode if specified). This element is optional. The coding system used shall be the HL7 LanguageProficiencyCode vocabulary when this element is communicated.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00270 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:preferenceInd) or cda:preferenceInd[@value="true"] or cda:preferenceInd[@value="false"]
Description In IHE PCC Language Communication (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1), the preferenceInd shall be valued "true" if this language is the patient's preferred language for communication, or "false" if this is not the patient's preferred language.
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00080 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1-errors_pa00067
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00271 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(//cda:recordTarget//cda:languageCommunication) < 2 or count(//cda:recordTarget//cda:languageCommunication) = count(//cda:recordTarget//cda:languageCommunication/cda:preferenceInd)
Description In IHE PCC Language Communication (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1), the preferenceInd element shall be present on all languageCommunication elements when more than one is provided.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00272 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(*[cda:templateId/@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1"]) = 0 or count(//cda:languageCommunication/cda:preferenceInd[@value="true"]) > 0
Description In IHE PCC Language Communication (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.1), when present at least one languageCommunication element must have a preferred value of true.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4-errors_pa00068 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00081 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4-errors_pa00068
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00273 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(../cda:participant) or ../cda:participant[@typeCode="IND"]
Description In IHE PCC Patient Contacts (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4), contacts that are recorded as participant elements shall have the classCode attribute shall set to 'IND'.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00274 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(../cda:participant) or cda:associatedEntity[@classCode = "AGNT" or @classCode = "CAREGIVER" or @classCode = "ECON" or @classCode = "NOK" or @classCode = "PRS"]
Description In IHE PCC Patient Contacts (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4), the associatedEntity element identifies the type of contact. The classCode attribute shall be present, and contains a value from the set AGNT, CAREGIVER, ECON, NOK, or PRS to identify contacts that are agents of the patient, care givers, emergency contacts, next of kin, or other relations respectively.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00275 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(../cda:participant) or not(cda:associatedEntity/cda:code) or cda:associatedEntity/cda:code[@code and @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111"]
Description In IHE PCC Patient Contacts (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4), in the associatedEntity code, the code attribute is required and comes from the HL7 PersonalRelationshipRoleType vocabulary. The codeSystem attribute is required and shall be represented exactly as shown.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00083 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.3.2-errors_pa00070

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00278 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00279 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"]
Description In IHE PCC Transport Mode (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.3.2), the section type code must come from the LOINC code system (2.16.840.1.113883.6.1).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00280 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: .//cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1"]
Description In IHE PCC Transport Mode (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.3.2), a Transport Mode must contain a Transport Entry.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00085 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1-errors_pa00072

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00283 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime[cda:low or cda:high]
Description In IHE PCC Transport Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1), the effectiveTime element shall be sent. Either low value or high value or both values SHALL be specified.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00284 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:effectiveTime/cda:low) or cda:effectiveTime/cda:low[@value or @nullFlavor]
Description In IHE PCC Transport Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1), the effectiveTime/low element shall be sent using the TS data type. If unknown, it must be recorded using a flavor of null.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00285 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:effectiveTime/cda:high) or cda:effectiveTime/cda:high[@value or @nullFlavor]
Description In IHE PCC Transport Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1), the effectiveTime/high element records the time of arrival. If unknown, it must be recorded using a flavor of null. This element shall be sent using the TS data type.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1-warnings_pa00073 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:09.321+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00086 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1-warnings_pa00073
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00286 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.102.4.2"]
Description In IHE PCC Transport Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.10.4.1), the code describes the intented mode of transport. For transport between facilities, IHE recommends the use of a code system based on the DEEDS Mode of Transportation (4.2) data element value set. However, the vocabulary used within an affinity domain should be determined by a policy agreement within the domain.

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00287 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.102.4.2' and @code=$cda-ch-codeSystem[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.6.102.4.2" and @codeSystemName='ModeOfTransport']/code/@value])
Description La description du transport DOIT contenir un code du tableau 'ModeOfTransport' (DEEDS4.02; OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.102.4.2)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00288 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: @classCode='ACT' and @moodCode=('INT', 'EVN')
Description Pour les transports, le classCode 'ACT' est REQUIS. Le moodCode 'INT' indiques un transport prévu et le moodCode 'EVN' indiques que le transport a déjà eu lieu. D'autres valeurs ne sont pas permis.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00096 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.6-errors_pa00083
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00308 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:observation
Description An FSA Survey Observation shall be a CDA Observation element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00309 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13"]
Description An FSA Survey Observation shall be an IHE Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00310 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31"]
Description An FSA Survey Observation shall be an ASTM/HL7 CCD Result Observation (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00311 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code
Description An FSA Survey Observation shall contain a code element to identify the observation made.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00312 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value/@xsi:type
Description An FSA Survey Observation shall contain a value element. It shall be of an appropriate data type for the survey observation made.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00313 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section[cda:templateId/@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.2.5" and cda:code/@code="46006-3"]) or not(ancestor::cda:organizer[cda:templateId/@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.7"]) or cda:value/@xsi:type="CO"
Description If an FSA Survey Observation is contained in an FSA Physical Function section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.2.5) with LOINC code 46006-3 and is contained in an FSA survey Panel (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.7), then it shall contain a value element with data type CO (Coded Ordinal).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00314 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section[cda:templateId/@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.2.5" and cda:code/@code="46006-3"]) or not(self::cda:observation/cda:code/@code="45611-1") or cda:value[@xsi:type="CO" and (not(@code) or @code="0" or @code="1")]
Description If an FSA Survey Observation has a LOINC code of 45611-1 and is contained in an FSA Physical Function section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.2.5) with LOINC code 46006-3, then it shall contain a value element with data type CO (Coded Ordinal) and a value from vocabulary 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.6.257.117 (0 is No, 1 is Yes, and no value attribute is Undetermined (UTD)).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00315 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:methodCode)
Description An FSA Survey Observation shall not contain a methodCode element since method is not relevant to survey responses.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00316 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:targetSiteCode)
Description An FSA Survey Observation shall not contain a targetSiteCode element since target site is not relevant to survey responses.
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00097 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.6-errors_pa00083
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00317 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@code="0" or @code="1" or @code="2" or @code="3" or @code="4" or @code="8"]
Description If an FSA Survey Observation has an observation value taken from vocabulary (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.6.257.755) of the US HHS CMS Minimum Data Set (MDS), then the code attribute for that value must be in the set {0,1,2,3,4,8}.
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00098 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.6-errors_pa00083
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00318 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@code="0" or @code="1" or @code="2" or @code="8"]
Description If an FSA Survey Observation has an observation value taken from vocabulary (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.6.257.768) of the US HHS CMS Minimum Data Set (MDS), then the code attribute for that value must be in the set {0,1,2,8}.
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00099 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.6-errors_pa00083

Description If an FSA Survey Observation has a LOINC code of 45546-9 and is contained in an FSA Physical Function section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.2.5) with LOINC code 46006-3 and is contained in an FSA survey Panel (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.7) with LOINC code 46012-1, then it shall contain a value element with value from vocabulary 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.6.257.117 (0 is No, 1 is Yes, and no value attribute is Undetermined (UTD)).

Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1-errors_pa00122 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00144 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1-errors_pa00122
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00462 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.55"]
Description In IHE PCC Severity (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1), the templateId for CCD Severity (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.55) must be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00463 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code="SEV" and @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4"]
Description In IHE PCC Severity (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1), the observation is of Severity, as indicated by the code element. This element is required. The code and codeSystem attributes shall be recorded exactly as indicated.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00464 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference
Description In IHE PCC Severity (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1), the <observation> element shall contain a <text> element. For CDA, the <text> elements shall contain a <reference> element pointing to the narrative where the severity is recorded, rather than duplicate text to avoid ambiguity.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00465 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code = "completed"]
Description In IHE PCC Severity (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1), the code attribute of <statusCode> for all Severity observations shall be completed. While the <statusCode> element is required in all acts to record the status of the act, the only sensible value of this element in this context is completed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00466 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type="CD"] and (((cda:value[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.1063" and (@code="H" or @code="M" or @code="L")]) ) or ( not(cda:value[@codeSystem]) ))
Description In IHE PCC Severity (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1), the >value< element contains the level of severity. It is always represented using t'he CD datatype (xsi:type='CD'), even though the value may be a coded or uncoded string. If coded, it should use the HL7 SeverityObservation vocabulary (codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.5.1063') containing three values (H, M, and L), representing high, moderate and low severity depending upon whether the severity is life threatening, presents noticeable adverse consequences, or is unlikely substantially effect the situation of the subject.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2-errors_pa00123 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.328+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00145 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2-errors_pa00123
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00467 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.40"]
Description In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the parent CCD templateId (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.40) for Comments must be included.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00468 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code="48767-8" and @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"]
Description In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the code element for Comments is required. The code and codeSystem attributes shall be recorded exactly as indicated.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00469 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference
Description In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the <observation> element shall contain a <text> element. For CDA, the <text> elements shall contain a <reference> element pointing to the narrative where the severity is recorded, rather than duplicate text to avoid ambiguity.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00470 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code = "completed"]
Description In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the code attribute of <statusCode> for all Comments shall be completed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00471 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:author) or ( cda:author/cda:time and cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:id and cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:addr and cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:telecom and ( cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:assignedPerson/cda:name or cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:representedOrganization/cda:name))
Description In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the Comment may have an author. The time of the comment creation shall be recorded in the <time> element when the <author> element is present. The identifier of the author, and their address and telephone number must be present inside the <id>, <addr> and <telecom> elements when the <author> element is present. The author's and/or the organization's name must be present when the <author> element is present.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2-extensions_pa00124 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]:
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00146 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2-extensions_pa00124
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00472 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code='48767-8' and @codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' and @codeSystemName='LOINC' and @displayName='Annotation comment']
Description Kommentare/Bemerkungen müssen folgendermassen codiert werden: code='48767-8' codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' codeSystemName='LOINC' displayName='Annotation Comment'
Description Annotation Comments must be coded as follows: code='48767-8' codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' codeSystemName='LOINC' displayName='Annotation Comment'
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4-errors_pa00125 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.344+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00147 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4-errors_pa00125
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00473 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:act[@classCode="ACT" and @moodCode="EVN"]
Description In IHE PCC External References (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4), the External Reference is an act that refers to documentation of an act (classCode='ACT'), that previously occurred (moodCode='EVN').
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00474 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id
Description In IHE PCC External References (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4), the reference is an act of itself, and must be uniquely identified with an id element.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4-warnings_pa00126 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.344+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00148 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4-warnings_pa00126
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00475 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@nullFlavor]
Description In IHE PCC External References (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4), the reference act has no code associated with it.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00476 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference[@value]
Description In IHE PCC External References (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4), in order to connect this external reference to the narrative text which it refers, the value of the reference element in the text element is a URI to an element in the CDA narrative of this document.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00477 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:reference[@typeCode="REFR" or @typeCode="SPRT"]/cda:externalDocument or cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="REFR" or @typeCode="SPRT"]/cda:act
Description In IHE PCC External References (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4), External References are listed as either supporting documentation (typeCode='SPRT') or simply reference material (typeCode='REFR') for the reader. If this distinction is not supported by the source EMR system, the value of typeCode should be REFR. For CDA, the reference is indicated by a reference element containing an externalDocument element which documents (classCode='DOC') the event (moodCode='EVN'). For HL7 Version 3 Messages, the reference is represented with the element sourceOf and the external document is representated with a act element, however semantics, and attributes remain otherwise without change.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5-errors_pa00127 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.344+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00149 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5-errors_pa00127
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00478 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:observation[@classCode="OBS" and @moodCode="EVN"]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the basic pattern for reporting a problem uses the CDA <observation> element, setting the classCode='OBS' to represent that this is an observation of a problem, and the moodCode='EVN', to represent that this is an observation that has in fact taken place.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00479 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.28"]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), <templateId> elements identify this under both IHE and CCD specifications (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.28). This CCD template ID SHALL be included.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00480 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the specific Problem Entry observation being recorded must have an identifier (<id>) that shall be provided for tracking purposes. If the source EMR does not or cannot supply an intrinsic identifier, then a GUID shall be provided as the root, with no extension (e.g., <id root='CE1215CD-69EC-4C7B-805F-569233C5E159'/>). At least one identifier must be present, more than one may appear.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00481 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the <text> element is required and points to the text describing the problem being recorded; including any dates, comments, et cetera. The <reference> contains a URI in value attribute. This URI points to the free text description of the problem in the document that is being described.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00482 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code="completed"]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), a clinical document normally records only those condition observation events that have been completed, not observations that are in any other state. Therefore, the <statusCode> shall always have code='completed' for Problem Entry.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00483 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime/cda:low[@value or @nullFlavor = "UNK"]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the effectiveTime <low> value should normally be present in Problem Entry. There are exceptions, such as for the case where the patient may be able to report that they had chicken pox, but are unsure when. In this case, the <effectiveTime> element shall have a <low> element with a nullFlavor attribute set to 'UNK'.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00484 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type="CD"]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the <value> is the condition that was found. This element is required. While the value of Problem Entry code may be a coded or an un-coded string, the type is always a coded value (xsi:type='CD').
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00485 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:value[@code and @codeSystem]) or (not(cda:value[@code]) and not(cda:value[@codeSystem]))
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), if Problem Entry value is coded, the code and codeSystem attributes shall be present. If uncoded, all attributes other than xsi:type='CD' must be absent.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00486 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"] | cda:subjectOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"]) <= 1
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), only one optional severity entry relationship is allowed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00487 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"]) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"] and cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), an optional <entryRelationship> element may be present in Problem Entry indicating the severity of the problem. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a severity observation conforming to the Severity entry template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1). The typeCode SHALL be SUBJ and inversionInd SHALL be true. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00488 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:subjectOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"]) or (cda:subjectOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"] and cda:subjectOf[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), an optional <entryRelationship> element may be present in Problem Entry indicating the severity of the problem. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a severity observation conforming to the Severity entry template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1). The typeCode SHALL be SUBJ and inversionInd SHALL be true. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <subjectOf> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00489 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"] | cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"]) <= 1
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), only one optional Problem Status Observation relationship is allowed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00490 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"]) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"] and cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="REFR" and @inversionInd="false"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), an optional <entryRelationship> element may be present in Problem Entry indicating the clinical status of the problem, e.g., resolved, in remission, active. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a clinical status observation conforming to the Problem Status Observation template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1). The typeCode SHALL be REFR and inversionInd SHALL be false. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00491 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"]) or (cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"] and cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="REFR" and @inversionInd="false"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), an optional <entryRelationship> element may be present in Problem Entry indicating the clinical status of the problem, e.g., resolved, in remission, active. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a clinical status observation conforming to the Problem Status Observation template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1). The typeCode SHALL be REFR and inversionInd SHALL be false. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00492 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2"] | cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2"]) <= 1
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), only one optional Health Status Observation relationship is allowed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00493 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2"]) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2"] and cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="REFR" and @inversionInd="false"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), an optional <entryRelationship> may be present in Problem Entry referencing the health status of the patient, e.g., resolved, in remission, active. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a clinical status observation conforming to the Health Status Observation template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2). The typeCode SHALL be REFR and inversionInd SHALL be false. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00494 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2"]) or (cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2"] and cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="REFR" and @inversionInd="false"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), an optional <entryRelationship> may be present in Problem Entry referencing the health status of the patient, e.g., resolved, in remission, active. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a clinical status observation conforming to the Health Status Observation template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.2). The typeCode SHALL be REFR and inversionInd SHALL be false. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00495 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"]) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"] and cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), one or more optional <entryRelationship> elements may be present providing an additional comments (annotations) for the condition. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a comment observation conforming to the Comment entry template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2). The typeCode SHALL be SUBJ and inversionInd SHALL be true. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00496 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"]) or (cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"] and cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), one or more optional <entryRelationship> elements may be present providing an additional comments (annotations) for the condition. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a comment observation conforming to the Comment entry template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2). The typeCode SHALL be SUBJ and inversionInd SHALL be true. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5-warnings_pa00128 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00150 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5-warnings_pa00128
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00497 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the code for Problem Entry describes the process of establishing a problem. The code element should be used, as the process of determining the value is important to clinicians (e.g., a diagnosis is a more advanced statement than a symptom).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00498 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6'] or cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.96']
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the recommended vocabulary for Problem Entry is '2.16.840.1.113883.6.96' (SNOMED CT).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00499 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6'] or cda:code[@code = '64572001' or @code = '418799008' or @code = '404684003' or @code = '409586006' or @code = '248536006' or @code = '55607006' or @code = '282291009']
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), the recommended vocabulary for describing Problem Entry is shown in a table.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00500 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:value[@codeSystem]) or cda:value[@codeSystemName]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), it is recommended that the value codeSystemName associated with the codeSystem be provided for diagnostic and human readability purposes, but this is not required by this profile.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00501 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:value[@code]) or cda:value[@displayName]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), it is recommended that the displayName for the code also be provided for diagnostic and human readability purposes, but this is not required by this profile.

Description Un problème DOIT contenir un code du tableau 'ProblemEntryCode' (OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) ou un code SNOMED CT pour des cas spéciaux (voir IHE PCC TF-2 Chapter 6.3.4.14.11)

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:act/cda:code[@nullFlavor='NA']) or (cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6']) or (cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.96' and (@code=('282291009', '55607006')or @code=$cda-ch-codeSystem[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" and @codeSystemName='IHE-PCC-TF2-Chapter-6.3.4.14.11-Problem']/code/@value)])
Description La déclaration d’une diagnose ou d’un problème est REQUIS pour l'indication 'Diagnostic(s) médical ou problème(s)' (SNOMED CT code 282291009 ou 55607006 attendu). Pour des cas spéciaux (voir IHE PCC TF-2 Chapter 6.3.4.14.11)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00511 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: @negationInd='false'
Description Aucune négation n’est permise pour la déclaration des problèmes
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00512 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference[@value]
Description La référence au texte correspondant dans la partie lisible pour l’être humain doit être indiquée au moyen de la référence au content[@ID]:reference[@value='#xxx']
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00513 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (ancestor::cda:act/cda:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27']) or not(cda:value[@code]) or (cda:value[@codeSystem='2.16.756.5.30.1.126.3.2.2013' and @code=$cda-ch-smcp-codeSystem[@root="2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.10" and @codeSystemName='SMCP_AdmissionProblems']/code/@value]) or (cda:value[@codeSystem='2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.5' and @code=$cda-ch-smcp-codeSystem[@root="2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.5" and @codeSystemName='SMCP_Accessories']/code/@value])
Description En cas de valeurs codées, les attributs code et codeSystem DOIVENT être indiqués selon les ensembles de valeurs 'SMCP_AdmissionProblems' ou 'SMCP_Accessories' (OIDs 2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.10 ou 2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.5)
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1-errors_pa00130 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00152 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1-errors_pa00130
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00514 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ../cda:act
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), the Concern Entry can only be used on acts.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00515 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ../cda:act[@classCode="ACT"] and ../cda:act[@moodCode="EVN"]
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), all concerns reflect the act of recording (<act classCode='ACT'>) the event (moodCode='EVN') of being concerned about a problem, allergy or other issue about the patient condition.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00516 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27"]
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), the required template identifiers indicates this Concern Entry conforms to the Concern Content module. This content module inherits constraints from the HL7 CCD Template for problem acts, and so also includes that template identifier (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00517 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), the Concern Entry requires id element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00518 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@nullFlavor="NA"]
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), the code is not applicable to a concern act (Concern Entry), and so shall be recorded as <code nullFlavor='NA'/>.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00519 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code="active" or @code="suspended" or @code="aborted" or @code="completed"]
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), the statusCode associated with any concern must be one of the following values: active, suspended, aborted or completed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00520 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime/cda:low
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), the <effectiveTime> element records the starting and ending times during which the concern (Concern Entry) was active. The <low> element shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00521 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:statusCode[@code="completed" or @code="aborted"] and cda:effectiveTime/cda:high) or (cda:statusCode[@code="active" or @code="suspended"] and not(cda:effectiveTime/cda:high))
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), the <effectiveTime> element records the starting and ending times during the concern (Concern Entry). The <high> element shall be present for concerns in the completed or aborted state, and shall not be present otherwise.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00522 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="SUBJ"] and cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5" or @root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6"]) or (cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="false"] and cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5" or @root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6"])
Description In IHE PCC Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1), each concern (Concern Entry) is about one or more related problems or allergies. This entry shall contain one or more problem or allergy entries that conform to the specification in section Problem Entry or Allergies and Intolerances. This is how a series of related observations can be grouped as a single concern. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element. The typeCode SHALL be SUBJ for both HL7 Version 3 and CDA. HL7 Version 3 additionally requires that inversionInd SHALL be false.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2-errors_pa00131 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.344+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00153 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2-errors_pa00131
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00523 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1"]
Description In IHE PCC Problem Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2), the Problem Concern Entry has a template identifier of 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2, and is a subtype of the Concern Entry, and so must also conform to that specification, with the template identifier of 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1. These elements are required and shall be recorded exactly as indicated.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00524 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode = "SUBJ"] and cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5"] and cda:entryRelationship[@inversionInd="false"]) or (cda:subjectOf[@typeCode = "SUBJ"] and cda:subjectOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5"] and cda:subjectOf[@inversionInd="false"])
Description In IHE PCC Problem Concern Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2), the Problem Concern Entry shall contain one or more problem entries that conform to the Problem Entry template 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <subjectOf> element. The typeCode SHALL be SUBJ and inversionInd SHALL be false.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2-extensions_pa00132 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
