Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00154 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2-extensions_pa00132
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00525 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@nullFlavor='NA']) or (descendant::cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5'])
Description La déclaration d’un problème est REQUIS pour l'indication 'Diagnostic(s) médical ou problème(s)' (template 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5 attendu)
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.3-errors_pa00133 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.3.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.344+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00155 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.3-errors_pa00133
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00526 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root = "2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27"] and cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1"]
Description In IHE PCC Allergy and Intolerance Concern: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.3), the parent CCD template ID (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27) and the parent PCC template ID (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.1) shall be present in the Allergy and Intolerance Concern.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00527 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="false"]//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6"]) or (cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="false"]//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6"])
Description In IHE PCC Allergy and Intolerance Concern: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.3), this Allergy and Intolerance Concern shall contain one or more allergy or intolerance entries that conform to the Allergy and Intolerance Entry. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element. The typeCode SHALL be 'SUBJ' and inversionInd SHALL be 'false'.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6-errors_pa00134 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.36+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00156 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6-errors_pa00134
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00528 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ../cda:observation[@classCode="OBS"]
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), allergies and intolerances are special kinds of problems, and so are also recorded in the CDA <observation> element, with classCode='OBS'.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00529 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5"]
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), this Allergies and Intolerances entry has a template identifier of 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6, and is a subtype of the 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5 Problem Entry, and so must also conform to the rules of the problem entry, which has the template identifier of 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5. These elements are required.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00530 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code and @codeSystem]
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), the <code> element of Allergies and Intolerances represents the kind of allergy observation made, to a drug, food or environmental agent, and whether it is an allergy, non-allergy intolerance, or unknown class of intolerance (not known to be allergy or intolerance). The <code> element of an allergy entry shall be provided, and a code and codeSystem attribute shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00531 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:value[@xsi:type="CD"]) and (cda:value[@code and @codeSystem] or cda:value[not(@code) and not(@codeSystem)])
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), the <value> is a description of the allergy or adverse reaction. While the value may be a coded or an uncoded string, the type is always a coded value (xsi:type='CD'). If coded, the code and codeSystem attributes must be present. The codingSystem should reference a controlled vocabulary describing allergies and adverse reactions. If uncoded, all attributes other than xsi:type='CD' must be absent.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00532 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:participant[@typeCode="CSM"]/cda:participantRole[@classCode="MANU"]/cda:playingEntity[@classCode="MMAT"]) or cda:participant[@typeCode="CSM"]/cda:participantRole[@classCode="MANU"]/cda:playingEntity[@classCode="MMAT"]/cda:code/cda:originalText/cda:reference
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), the <code> element shall be present. It may contain a code and codeSystem attribute to indicate the code for the substance causing the allergy or intolerance. It shall contain a <reference> to the <originalText> in the narrative where the substance is named.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00533 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5"]) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5"] and cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.54"])
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), the entry contained with this Allergies and Intolerance entry relationship is some sort of problem that is a manifestation of the allergy. It is recorded using the Problem Entry structure (template identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5), with the additional template identifier (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.54) indicating that this problem is a reaction.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00534 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"]) and not(cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"])) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"] and cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"]) or (cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1"] and cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"])
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), an optional <entryRelationship> element may be present indicating the severity of the problem. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a severity observation conforming to the Severity entry template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1). For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element. The typeCode SHALL be 'SUBJ' and inversionInd SHALL be 'true'.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00535 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"]) and not(cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"])) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"] and cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="REFR" and @inversionInd="false"]) or (cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1"] and cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="REFR" and @inversionInd="false"])
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), an optional <entryRelationship> may be present indicating the clinical status of the allergy, e.g., resolved, in remission, active. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain a clinical status observation conforming to the Problem Status Observation template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.1.1). The typeCode SHALL be 'REFR' and inversionInd SHALL be 'false'. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00536 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (not(cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"]) and not(cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"])) or (cda:entryRelationship/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"] and cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"]) or (cda:sourceOf/*/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2"] and cda:sourceOf[@typeCode="SUBJ" and @inversionInd="true"])
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), one or more optional <entryRelationship> elements may be present providing an additional comments (annotations) for the allergy. When present, this <entryRelationship> element shall contain an entry conforming to the Comment entry template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2). The typeCode SHALL be SUBJ and inversionInd SHALL be true. For CDA this SHALL be represented with the <entryRelationship> element. For HL7 Version 3 Messages, this SHALL be represented as a <sourceOf> element.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6-warnings_pa00135 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00157 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6-warnings_pa00135
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00537 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@displayName and @codeSystemName]
Description In IHE PCC Allergies and Intolerances (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6), the <code> element of Allergies and Intolerances represents the kind of allergy observation made, to a drug, food or environmental agent, and whether it is an allergy, non-allergy intolerance, or unknown class of intolerance (not known to be allergy or intolerance). The displayName and codeSystemName attributes should be present.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6-extensions_pa00136 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00158 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.6-extensions_pa00136
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00538 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.5.4' and @code=$cda-ch-codeSystem[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" and @codeSystemName='ObservationIntoleranceType']/code/@value] or cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.96' and @code=$cda-ch-codeSystem[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" and @codeSystemName='IHE-PCC-TF2-Chapter-6.3.4.14.11-Allergy']/code/@value]
Description Une allergie ou autre réaction indésirable DOIT contenir un code du tableau 'ObservationIntoleranceType' (OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4) ou un code SNOMED CT pour des cas spéciaux (voir IHE PCC TF-2 Chapter 6.3.4.14.11)
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7-errors_pa00137 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00159 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7-errors_pa00137
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00539 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root = "2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24"]
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), all Medications entries use the templateId element specified (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24) to indicate that they are medication acts. This element is required.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00540 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7.1"] | cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.8"] | cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.9"] | cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.10"] | cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.11"]) = 1
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the <templateId> element identifies this Medications <entry> as a particular type of medication event, allowing for validation of the content. As a side effect, readers of the CDA can quickly locate and identify medication events. The templateId must use one of the values in the table in the specification.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00541 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:templateId[@root = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7.1"]) or count(.//cda:substanceAdministration) = 0
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), template ID 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7.1 indicates a "normal" <substanceAdministration> act that may not contain any subordinate <substanceAdministration> acts.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00542 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:id) = 1
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), a top level <substanceAdministration> element must be uniquely identified in Medications. If there is no explicit identifier for this observation in the source EMR system, a GUID may be used for the root attribute, and the extension may be omitted. Although HL7 allows for multiple identifiers, this profile requires that one and only one be used.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00543 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code = "completed"]
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the status of all Medications <substanceAdministration> elements must be "completed". The act has either occurred, or the request or order has been placed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00544 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:consumable/cda:manufacturedProduct/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7.2"]
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the <consumable> element shall be present, and shall contain a <manufacturedProduct> entry conforming to the Product Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7.2) template.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7-warnings_pa00138 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00160 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7-warnings_pa00138
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00545 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:effectiveTime[1][@xsi:type="IVL_TS"]) and cda:effectiveTime[1]/cda:low[@value or @nullFlavor="UNK"] and cda:effectiveTime[1]/cda:high[@value or @nullFlavor="UNK"]
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the first <effectiveTime> of Medications is required if known and encodes the start and stop time of the medication regimen. This an interval of time (xsi:type='IVL_TS'), and must be specified as shown. The <low> and <high> values of the first <effectiveTime> element represent the start and stop times for the medication. The <low> value represents the start time, and the <high> value represents the stop time. If either the <low> or the <high> value is unknown, this shall be recorded by setting the nullFlavor attribute to UNK.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00546 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime[@operator="A"]
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the frequency of medication in Medications to be administered is required if known. It shall be recorded as an effectiveTime element with an operator attribute equal to "A".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00547 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:routeCode
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), a routeCode for Medications must be specified if the route is known.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00548 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:routeCode) or cda:routeCode[@codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.5.112"]
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the routeCode for Medications should use the HL7 RouteOfAdministration vocabulary.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00549 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:routeCode) or cda:routeCode/@displayName
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the routeCode's displayName should be specified.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00550 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:doseQuantity
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the doseQuantity is required if known.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00551 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:rateQuantity
Description In IHE PCC Medications (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7), the rateQuantity is required if known.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7-extensions_pa00139 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00161 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7-extensions_pa00139
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00552 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.96']) or (cda:code[@code=$cda-ch-codeSystem[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" and @codeSystemName='IHE-PCC-TF2-Table-6.3.4.16.7-1']/code/@value])
Description Pour les cas spéciaux de la médication, un code du tableau '[IHE PCC TF-2], Table 6.3.4.16.7-1' DOIT être utilisé.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00553 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:participant/cda:participantRole)
Description Une ordonnance a été remise. Les indications concernant le destinataire sont déclarées.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00554 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(descendant::cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4'])
Description Une ordonnance a été remise. Elle est accompagné par un document référencé.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13-errors_pa00140 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.297+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00162 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13-errors_pa00140
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00555 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), each Simple Observation shall have an <id> identifier.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00556 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), Simple Observations shall have a code describing what was measured.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00557 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), each observation measurement entry may contain a text element providing the free text that provides the same information as the observation within the narrative portion of the document with a text element. For CDA based uses of Simple Observations, this element SHALL be present, and SHALL contain a reference element that points to the related string in the narrative portion of the document.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00558 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code = "completed"]
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), the status code of all Simple Observations shall be completed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00559 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime[@nullFlavor or @value or (cda:low[@nullFlavor or @value] and cda:high[@nullFlavor or @value])]
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), the <effectiveTime> element shall be present in Simple Observations, and shall record the date and time when the measurement was taken. This element should be precise to the day. If the date and time is unknown, this element should record that using the nullFlavor attribute. It shall be recorded using the appropriate data type, which means that it may denote a single point in time or an interval containing a <low> and <high> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00560 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), the value of the Simple Observation shall be recorded using a data type appropriate to the observation.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13-warnings_pa00141 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.297+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00163 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13-warnings_pa00141
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00561 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime[@nullFlavor or (string-length(@value) >= 8) or (cda:low[@nullFlavor or (string-length(@value) >= 8)] and cda:high[@nullFlavor or (string-length(@value) >= 8)])]
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), the effectiveTime element of a Simple Observation should be precise to the day. If the date and time is unknown, this element should record that using the nullFlavor attribute.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00164 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13-notes_pa00142
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00562 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:templateId[@root=('1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.4', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7')]) or (cda:interpretationCode)
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), if there is an interpretation that can be performed using an observation result (e.g., high, borderline, normal, low), these may be recorded within the interpretationCode element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00563 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:templateId[@root=('1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.4', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.6', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7')]) or (cda:methodCode)
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), the methodCode element may be used to record the specific method used to make an observation when this information is not already pre-coordinated with the observation code.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00564 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:templateId[@root=('1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.4', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.12.3.6', '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7')]) or (cda:targetSiteCode)
Description In IHE PCC Simple Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13), the targetSiteCode may be used to record the target site where an observation is made when this information is not already pre-coordinated with the observation code.

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@code='2.3' and @codeSystem='2.16.756.5.30.1.1.1.1.3.6']) or (cda:value[@xsi:type='CD' and @nullFlavor]) or (cda:value[@xsi:type='CD' and @codeSystem='2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.3' and @code=$cda-ch-smcp-codeSystem[@root="2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.3" and @codeSystemName='SMCP_PLAFA']/code/@value])
Description Une indication 'PLAFA' DOIT contenir un code du tableau 'SMCP_PLAFA' (OID: 2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.3)

Description Une indication 'Chômage' DOIT contenir un code du tableau 'EmploymentStatus' (OID: 2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.12)

Description Une indication 'PLAFA' DOIT contenir une déclaration des Dates relatives au PLAFA
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7-errors_pa00147 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00169 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7-errors_pa00147
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00600 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:repeatNumber) and not(cda:interpretationCode) and not(cda:methodCode) and not(cda:targetSiteCode)
Description In IHE PCC Advance Directive Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7), an Advance Directive Observation shall not contain any repeatNumber, interpretationCode, methodCode or targetSiteCode elements.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00601 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13"] and cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.17"]
Description In IHE PCC Advance Directive Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7), the templateId elements shown in the specification shall be present, and indicate that this is an Advance Directive entry.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00172 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.7-extensions_pa00150

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:code[@code='71388002']) or (cda:value[@xsi:type='BL' and @value=('true', 'false')])
Description Pour la directive anticipée une value de type xsi:type='BL' DOIT être utilisée (l’attribut value avec valeur 'true' indiques une approbation et 'false' indiqes rejet.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00605 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore

Description Pour une directive anticipée avec le code 71388002 (autre directive) l'élément value n'est pas permis

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00173 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14-errors_pa00151
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00607 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: @classCode="ENC"
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), the classCode shall be ENC.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00608 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@moodCode="EVN") or cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.21"]
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), the templateId indicates that this encounter entry conforms to the constraints of this content module. NOTE: When the encounter is in event mood (moodCode='EVN'), this entry conforms to the CCD template 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.21, and when in other moods, this entry conforms to the CCD template 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00609 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: @moodCode="EVN" or cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25"]
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), the templateId indicates that this encounter entry conforms to the constraints of this content module. NOTE: When the encounter is in event mood (moodCode='EVN'), this entry conforms to the CCD template 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.21, and when in other moods, this entry conforms to the CCD template 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00610 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), the id element is required.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00611 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), code is a required element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00612 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), the text element shall contain a reference to the narrative text describing the encounter.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00613 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:participant[@typeCode="LOC"]) or cda:participant[@typeCode="LOC"]/cda:participantRole[@classCode="SDLOC"]
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), a participant with typeCode LOC may be present to provide information about the location where the encounter is to be or was performed. This element shall have a participantRole element with classCode='SDLOC' that describes the service delivery location.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00614 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:particpant[@typeCode="LOC"]) or cda:participant[@typeCode="LOC"]/cda:participantRole/cda:playingEntity/cda:name
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), in a participant with typeCode LOC there shall be a playingEntity with a name.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14-warnings_pa00152 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00174 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14-warnings_pa00152
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00615 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4"]
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), code is a required element and should contain a code from the HL7 ActEncounterCode vocabulary describing the type of encounter (e.g., inpatient, ambulatory, emergency, et cetera).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00616 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@moodCode = "EVN" or @moodCode = "APT") or cda:effectiveTime
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), the effectiveTime element records the time over which the encounter occurred (in EVN mood), or the desired time of the encounter in ARQ or APT mood. In EVN or APT mood, the effectiveTime element should be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00617 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@moodCode="EVN") or cda:performer
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), when in EVN mood at least one performer should be present that identifies the provider of the service given during the encounter. More than one performer may be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00618 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:particpant[@typeCode="LOC"]) or cda:participant[@typeCode="LOC"]/cda:participantRole/cda:addr
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), an addr element should be present in a participant with typeCode LOC to give the address of the location.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00619 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:particpant[@typeCode="LOC"]) or cda:participant[@typeCode="LOC"]/cda:participantRole/cda:telecom
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), a telecom element should be present in a participant with typeCode LOC to give the telephone number of the location.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14-notes_pa00153 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.313+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00175 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14-notes_pa00153
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00620 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ./@moodCode="PRMS" or ./@moodCode="ARQ" or ./@moodCode="EVN"
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), the moodCode may be PRMS to indicated a scheduled appointment, ARQ to describe a request for an appointment that has been made but not yet scheduled by a provider, or EVN, to describe an encounter that has already occurred.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00621 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@moodCode="ARQ") or cda:effectiveTime or (not(cda:effectiveTime) and cda:priorityCode)
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), when in ARQ mood, if the effectiveTime element is not present, then priorityCode may be present to indicate that a callback is required to schedule the appoitment.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00622 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:particpant[@typeCode="LOC"]) or cda:participant[@typeCode="LOC"]/cda:participantRole/cda:id
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), an id element may be present in a participant with typeCode LOC to identify the service delivery location.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00623 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:particpant[@typeCode="LOC"]) or cda:participant[@typeCode="LOC"]/cda:participantRole/cda:code
Description In IHE PCC Encounters (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14), a code element may be present in a participant with typeCode LOC to classify the service delivery location.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14-extensions_pa00154 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]:
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00176 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14-extensions_pa00154
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00624 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section/cda:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.10']) or @moodCode=('PRMS', 'ARQ')
Description Pour les consultations, le moodCode 'PRMS' indiques un rencontre agendé et le moodCode 'ARQ' indiques un rencontre demandé mais pas encore agendé. D'autres valeurs ne sont pas permis.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00625 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime[cda:low and cda:high]
Description Date/heure de début et de fin du rencontre effectué ou prévu sont requis. Si une des dates est inconnue, la valeur low ou high DOIT être indiquée avec nullFlavor.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00626 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:performer/cda:assignedEntity[cda:id[@nullFlavor or (@root='1.3.88' or @root='2.51.1.3')]]/cda:assignedPerson/cda:name
Description Au moins un prestateur doit être présent qui représente le fournisseur de la prestation effectuée ou prévue. Le No GLN ainsi que le nom sont REQUIS. Si le prestateur est inconnue, ces valeur DOIVENT être indiquée avec nullFlavor.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00627 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section/cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.20.2.1']) or (cda:code/cda:translation[@codeSystem='2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.2' and @code=$cda-ch-smcp-codeSystem[@root="2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.2" and @codeSystemName='SMCP_AdmissionType']/code/@value])
Description La demande d’admission pour un hébergement DOIT être déclaré par un élément <translation> et DOIT contenir un code du tableau 'SMCP_AdmissionType' (OID: 2.16.756.5.30.1.112.3.1.201207.2)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00628 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section/cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.20.2.1']) or cda:code[@code=('IMP', 'EMER')]
Description Une demande d’admission pour un hébergement DOIT contenir le code IMP (inpatient encounter) ou EMER (emergency) pour transfert en urgence.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00629 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section/cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.20.2.1']) or @moodCode=('EVN', 'ARQ')
Description Pour les demandes d’admission, le moodCode 'EVN' DOIT être utilisé pour un transfert en urgence et le moodCode 'ARQ' pour une demande d’admission pour un hébergement. D'autres valeurs ne sont pas permis.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00630 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section/cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.20.2.1']) or not(@moodCode='EVN') or (cda:code[@code='EMER'])
Description Pour les demandes d’admission avec transfert en urgence le moodCode 'EVN' et le code 'EMER' sont REQUIS.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00631 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(ancestor::cda:section/cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.20.2.1']) or not(@moodCode='ARQ') or (cda:code[@code='IMP'])
Description Pour les demandes d’admission sans transfert en urgence le moodCode 'ARQ' et le code 'IMP' sont REQUIS.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-errors_pa00155 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.328+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00177 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-errors_pa00155
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00632 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:procedure[@classCode="PROC"]
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), the classCode for Procedure Entry shall be "PROC" and the element is procedure.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00633 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(./@moodCode="EVN") or cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.29"]
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), when the Procedure Entry is in event mood (moodCode='EVN'), this entry conforms to the CCD template 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.29.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00634 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(./@moodCode="INT") or cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25"]
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), when the Procedure Entry is in intent mood (moodCode='INT'), this entry conforms to the CCD template 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00635 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), a Procedure Entry shall contain an id element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00636 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), a Procedure Entry shall contain a code element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00637 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), a Procedure Entry text element shall contain a reference to the narrative text describing the procedure.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00638 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(./@moodCode="EVN") or cda:statusCode[@code = "completed" or @code = "active" or @code = "aborted" or @code = "cancelled"]
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), the <statusCode> element shall be present when used to describe a Procedure Event. It shall have the value 'completed' for procedures that have been completed, and 'active' for procedures that are still in progress. Procedures that were stopped prior to completion shall use the value 'aborted', and procedures that were cancelled before being started shall use the value 'cancelled'.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00639 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(./@moodCode="INT") or (cda:effectiveTime or cda:priorityCode)
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), in Procedure Entry the priorityCode element shall be present in INT mood when effectiveTime is not provided, it may be present in other moods. It indicates the priority of the procedure.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-warnings_pa00156 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.328+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00178 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-warnings_pa00156
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00640 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code]
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), a Procedure Entry should contain a code describing the type of procedure.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00641 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), the effectiveTime element should be present and records the time at which the procedure occurred (in EVN mood), or the desired time of the procedure in INT mood.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-notes_pa00157 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-02-03T17:12:10.328+01:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00179 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-notes_pa00157
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00642 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ./@moodCode = "INT" or ./@moodCode = "EVN"
Description In IHE PCC Procedure Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19), the moodCode of Procedure Entry may be INT to indicate a planned procedure or EVN, to describe a procedure that has already occurred.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-extensions_pa00158 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]:
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-smcp_ru00180 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-smcp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19-extensions_pa00158
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-smcp_as00643 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(descendant::cda:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4'])
Description Un protocole de mesures de contrainte est annexé
